Entry.JapaneseText: キョグエンは人手不足みたいだヨ。
Entry.EnglishText: Things seem pretty short-staffed here in Kyogen.

Entry.JapaneseText: 人手不足？ なんの事だ？
みんな裕福だから、 働く人が少なくなったんだって。
Entry.EnglishText: Everyone's so rich that there aren't many people who actually work.

Entry.JapaneseText: だからボクたちみたいな旅人を見つけて 雇ったりするんだネ。
Entry.EnglishText: So they have to look for travelers like us to hire.

Entry.JapaneseText: なるほど…… そういう事か……
Entry.EnglishText: I see... It's that sort of thing...

Entry.JapaneseText: 要するにアレだね…… 怠け者の街ってコトだね……
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah, basically... This is a town of slackers...
